author: cnbc.com
title: Seldat Distribution, Inc. Achieves FDA Approval
text:
SOUTH PLAINFIELD, N.J., Seldat Distribution, Inc., announced it has obtained Food and Drug Administration (FDA) certification for its warehouses located in Burlington, NJ, Compton, CA and Fontana, CA. Retailers, manufacturers, wholesalers and many other businesses rely on Seldat to warehouse, track and distribute their goods 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year. This FDA approval allows Seldat to store perishable packaged goods in highly regulated, highly efficient warehouses – just one more step toward high customer satisfaction. New packaging and preservation techniques have opened up new growth markets and shelf-stable food logistics will form another link in Seldat's technology-driven supply chain solutions.
The U.S. FDA food facility registration is required for all facilities that manufacture, process, pack, or store food, beverages, or dietary supplements that may be consumed in the United States.
"Seldat's facilites are now registered with the US Food & Drug Administration (FDA) as an Ambient Food Storage Warehouse /Holding Facility," states Aaron Huntt, Senior VP – Operations & Supply Chain Solutions. This allows Seldat to serve our customers with the right recipe for success."
ABOUT
Seldat Distribution, Inc. provides innovative, scalable solutions and services that help companies in every link of the global supply chain grow and prosper. Our mission is to empower businesses and consumers worldwide to find, buy, and sell anything–without the limitations of borders and logistics challenges. Headquartered in South Plainfield, New Jersey, Seldat employs more than 2,200 people across North America, LATAM, EMEA, and APAC. To learn more, please visit www.seldatinc.com , tech.seldatinc.com , and oceanstarinc.com .
